about_the_game:
JOIN OUR DISCORD



First Blood : Persian Legends is a story-driven real-time-tactic strategy game based on ancient Persia, Sassanid Empire, year 488 CE. Our story is heavily inspired by true events.
Drive different characters from your team to the best of their capabilities and propel the story forward with seemingly impossible stealth missions. Choose different approaches infiltrating a prison, a city or a convoy, set up convenient plans and horrors on the path of your enemies.

The group is composed of different personalities. Over the course of the whole game, the characters in our story cross paths and go through a journey of trust, friendship, loyalty and betrayal.



The story starts with Vahid, The Assassin, working under the spell of Sukhra, a powerful nobleman. Vahid has great stealth mechanics capable of killing a fleet of enemies without any noise. As the rightful heir of the throne, Kavadh, needs rescuing, Vahid goes on a journey to alter the course of history for him and the whole Sassanid empire.

Later we meet Nizar, The General, of the late king. He is a strong character capable of killing multiple foes at once but giving away subtlety of stealth.

Liana, The Concubine, comes along on the second mission where she becomes the driving force of the story. Camouflaging is her main source of power.


  • Play as three completely different characters with their rich and unique skill sets
  • Find dozens of ways to infiltrate enemy lines
  • Execute your objectives with pure stealth mechanics
  • A isometric stylized setting that captivates imagination like never before
  • Explore beautiful landscapes of ancient Persia, the Sassanid Empire
  • Make best use of stealth and tactics to defeat foes
  • Enchanting music and sound settings based on the ancient era

These three characters, The Assassin, The General and The Concubine are your playable characters to find and survive impossible missions to unlock the history. Can you help saving the Sassanid Empire from within?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 4th-Generation 3.5GHz, AMD Quad-Core 3.9GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 570, AMD Radeon HD 6950, 2GB Vram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
  • Additional Notes: Installing the game on an SSD improves loading times.
